name: Ghost Town (itch) (ZAG852, Zaidis)
description:
Welcome to our game. Try to survive for as many rounds as you can. Feel free to leave a comment below about what you thought of the game. Thanks for playing and I hope you have fun.

Made during the 2021 Brackey's Jam

Instructions:

WASD to Move

Press ESC to pause the game

Press E to pick up weapons Or Interact with the weapon and ammo caches

Press F to drop weapons

Press SPACE to open the crafting menu
